wikipedia_page.main: Robert McGregor RSA (1847–1922) was a Scottish landscape painter, genre painter, portrait painter and marine painter. His genre was particularly painting working men such as fishermen, shepherds, crofters, pedlars, and farm labourers. However he also painted Scottish, French and Dutch country and coastal scenery. He usually signed his work in the right hand bottom corner.

response: Robert McGregor or MacGregor may refer to:
* Robert McGregor (Australian politician) (1853–1931), English-born Australian politician
